body_html:
I experience the same error on MacOSX 10.13. Following installation description from here, I got

[ 81%] Linking CXX shared library ../lib/libcaffe2_gpu.dylib
ld: warning: directory not found for option '-L/Users/USER/Documents/ML/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/lib'
Undefined symbols for architecture x86_64:
  "_MPI_Comm_free", referenced from:
      caffe2::MPICommonWorldWrapper::~MPICommonWorldWrapper() in mpi_ops_gpu.cc.o
  "_MPI_Comm_rank", referenced from:
      caffe2::MPICommonWorldWrapper::MPICommonWorldWrapper(ompi_communicator_t*, int, int) in mpi_ops_gpu.cc.o
  "_MPI_Comm_size", referenced from:
      caffe2::MPICommonWorldWrapper::MPICommonWorldWrapper(ompi_communicator_t*, int, int) in mpi_ops_gpu.cc.o
  "_MPI_Comm_split", referenced from:
      caffe2::MPICommonWorldWrapper::MPICommonWorldWrapper(ompi_communicator_t*, int, int) in mpi_ops_gpu.cc.o
  "_MPI_Finalized", referenced from:
      caffe2::MPICommonWorldWrapper::~MPICommonWorldWrapper() in mpi_ops_gpu.cc.o
  "caffe2::TypeIdentifier caffe2::TypeMeta::Id<caffe2::MPICommonWorldWrapper>()", referenced from:
      caffe2::MPICreateCommonWorldOp<caffe2::CUDAContext>::RunOnDevice() in mpi_ops_gpu.cc.o
  "_ompi_mpi_comm_null", referenced from:
      caffe2::MPICreateCommonWorldOp<caffe2::CUDAContext>::RunOnDevice() in mpi_ops_gpu.cc.o
      void caffe2::TypeMeta::_Ctor<caffe2::MPICommonWorldWrapper>(void*, unsigned long) in mpi_ops_gpu.cc.o
      caffe2::MPICommonWorldWrapper::MPICommonWorldWrapper(ompi_communicator_t*, int, int) in mpi_ops_gpu.cc.o
ld: symbol(s) not found for architecture x86_64
clang: error: linker command failed with exit code 1 (use -v to see invocation)
make[2]: *** [lib/libcaffe2_gpu.dylib] Error 1
make[1]: *** [caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2_gpu.dir/all] Error 2
make: *** [all] Error 2
Failed to run 'bash ../tools/build_pytorch_libs.sh --use-cuda --use-nnpack caffe2 libshm THD'

And here the configuration:

body:
I experience the same error on MacOSX 10.13. Following installation description from [here](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch#from-source), I got 
```
[ 81%] Linking CXX shared library ../lib/libcaffe2_gpu.dylib
ld: warning: directory not found for option '-L/Users/USER/Documents/ML/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install/lib'
Undefined symbols for architecture x86_64:
  "_MPI_Comm_free", referenced from:
      caffe2::MPICommonWorldWrapper::~MPICommonWorldWrapper() in mpi_ops_gpu.cc.o
  "_MPI_Comm_rank", referenced from:
      caffe2::MPICommonWorldWrapper::MPICommonWorldWrapper(ompi_communicator_t*, int, int) in mpi_ops_gpu.cc.o
  "_MPI_Comm_size", referenced from:
      caffe2::MPICommonWorldWrapper::MPICommonWorldWrapper(ompi_communicator_t*, int, int) in mpi_ops_gpu.cc.o
  "_MPI_Comm_split", referenced from:
      caffe2::MPICommonWorldWrapper::MPICommonWorldWrapper(ompi_communicator_t*, int, int) in mpi_ops_gpu.cc.o
  "_MPI_Finalized", referenced from:
      caffe2::MPICommonWorldWrapper::~MPICommonWorldWrapper() in mpi_ops_gpu.cc.o
  "caffe2::TypeIdentifier caffe2::TypeMeta::Id<caffe2::MPICommonWorldWrapper>()", referenced from:
      caffe2::MPICreateCommonWorldOp<caffe2::CUDAContext>::RunOnDevice() in mpi_ops_gpu.cc.o
  "_ompi_mpi_comm_null", referenced from:
      caffe2::MPICreateCommonWorldOp<caffe2::CUDAContext>::RunOnDevice() in mpi_ops_gpu.cc.o
      void caffe2::TypeMeta::_Ctor<caffe2::MPICommonWorldWrapper>(void*, unsigned long) in mpi_ops_gpu.cc.o
      caffe2::MPICommonWorldWrapper::MPICommonWorldWrapper(ompi_communicator_t*, int, int) in mpi_ops_gpu.cc.o
ld: symbol(s) not found for architecture x86_64
clang: error: linker command failed with exit code 1 (use -v to see invocation)
make[2]: *** [lib/libcaffe2_gpu.dylib] Error 1
make[1]: *** [caffe2/CMakeFiles/caffe2_gpu.dir/all] Error 2
make: *** [all] Error 2
Failed to run 'bash ../tools/build_pytorch_libs.sh --use-cuda --use-nnpack caffe2 libshm THD'
```

And here the configuration:
```
-- 
-- ******** Summary ********
-- General:
--   CMake version         : 3.12.2
--   CMake command         : /Users/USER/miniconda3/envs/pytorch-latest/bin/cmake

--   C++ compiler version  : 9.0.0.9000038
--   BLAS                  : MKL

--   Build type            : Release
--   Compile definitions   : ONNX_NAMESPACE=onnx_torch;USE_GCC_ATOMICS=1;TH_BLAS_MKL;HAVE_MMAP=1;_FILE_OFFSET_BITS=64;HAVE_SHM_OPEN=1;HAVE_SHM_UNLINK=1
--   CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH     : /Users/USER/miniconda3/envs/pytorch-latest/lib/python3.7/site-packages
--   CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX  : /Users/USER/pytorch/torch/lib/tmp_install
-- 
--   TORCH_VERSION         : 1.0.0
--   CAFFE2_VERSION        : 1.0.0
--   BUILD_ATEN_MOBILE     : OFF
--   BUILD_BINARY          : OFF
--   BUILD_CUSTOM_PROTOBUF : ON
--     Link local protobuf : ON
--   BUILD_DOCS            : OFF
--   BUILD_PYTHON          : ON
--     Python version      : 3.7
--     Python executable   : /Users/USER/miniconda3/envs/pytorch-latest/bin/python

--     Python library      : /Users/USER/miniconda3/envs/pytorch-latest/lib/python3.7
--     Python includes     : /Users/USER/miniconda3/envs/pytorch-latest/include/python3.7m
--     Python site-packages: lib/python3.7/site-packages

--     CUDA library        : /usr/local/cuda/lib/libcuda.dylib

--     cublas library      : /usr/local/cuda/lib/libcublas.dylib

--     CUDA host compiler  : /Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Toolchains/XcodeDefault.xctoolchain/usr/bin/clang
--     USE_TENSORRT        : OFF
--   USE_ROCM              : OFF
--   USE_EIGEN_FOR_BLAS    : 
--   USE_FFMPEG            : OFF
--   USE_GFLAGS            : OFF
--   USE_GLOG              : OFF
--   USE_LEVELDB           : OFF
--   USE_LITE_PROTO        : OFF
--   USE_LMDB              : OFF
--   USE_METAL             : OFF
--   USE_MKL               : 
--   USE_MOBILE_OPENGL     : OFF
--   USE_NCCL              : OFF
--   USE_NERVANA_GPU       : OFF
--   USE_NNPACK            : 1
--   USE_OBSERVERS         : ON
--   USE_OPENCL            : OFF
--   USE_OPENCV            : OFF
--   USE_OPENMP            : OFF
--   USE_PROF              : OFF
--   USE_REDIS             : OFF
--   USE_ROCKSDB           : OFF

--     USE_GLOO            : OFF
--     USE_GLOO_IBVERBS    : OFF
--   Public Dependencies  : Threads::Threads;caffe2::mkl
--   Private Dependencies : nnpack;cpuinfo;/usr/local/Cellar/open-mpi/1.10.2_1/lib/libmpi_cxx.dylib;/usr/local/Cellar/open-mpi/1.10.2_1/lib/libmpi.dylib;aten_op_header_gen;onnxifi_loader
```
